Will be installed on:
HP Envy 17-3090NR 3D / ATI CCC v13.4 / TriDef v3.6.23 / Bios F09 / W7 HP x64 SP1
http://h10025.www1.hp.com/ewfrf/wc/document?docname=c03151794&tmp_task=prodinfoCategory&cc=us&dlc=en〈=en&lc=en&product=5218414

OK,,,it works. This IS definitely a W8 game, you will ave to get used to the METRO interface used with W8 and this game.
A bug I found, my arrow pointer disappeared (W7),,,I thought I would have to do a hard shut down/reset. 
Navigation is via your KB unless you have a touch screen.
